participant_1.background:
I'm not into Comic Con, but I have a great time with my family.
I wake up early and stretch before getting ready for my day.
I used to wear tight clothes, but now I prefer more comfortable options.
I loved playing with my dog as a child.
I like listening to chill music to help me relax and focus on my studies.

participant_2.background:
I've been in a bit of a funk since my house was robbed, but creating new recipes always helps me feel better.
my favorite fruit is apple.
I'm single and I live with my cat, Speckles.
my favorite holiday is halloween.
i am chubby.

content.text: Hey, how has your day been?
Hello! It's been going okay. I've been in a bit of a funk since my house was robbed, but creating new recipes always helps me feel better.
I'm sorry to hear that, I hope you're able to get back into a good place soon. I love cooking too, it's so relaxing. What type of recipes do you like to make?
I like to make all sorts of things, but I'm really into baking right now. I'm trying to perfect my apple pie recipe.
That's awesome! I love apple pie too. I'm not the best baker, but I'm always up for trying new recipes.
Maybe we could make a pie together sometime? I could show you some tips and tricks.
That sounds like fun! I'd love to learn how to make a better pie.
Great! We can set a date for next weekend. I'll bring all the ingredients and you can bring the drinks.
Sounds like a plan! I'm excited to try my hand at baking again.
Me too! I'm sure you'll do great.
